title: Should you buy your grandma a robot?
description:
The pandemic has made robot caregivers a popular way to keep elderly people company. But as Vox's Sigal Samuel explains, they're not for everyone.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Should you buy your grandma a robot?
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Some social robots have been shown to improve health outcomes in elderly patients.
